name: Scarlet Sun
description:
-- SCARLET SUN --

After getting separated from their friend, Lapin must navigate a crumbling ruin that they ended up in thanks to a mysterious door. Use the scarlet red light coming from the sun to create platforms, and push your way through large stones to navigate the ruins in this ~10 minute short game.

PRESS F4 FOR FULLSCREEN

                   

- Platforms: Windows

- Made in RPG Maker MV for my videogame art/animation college project
